transArray.content: The breakfast is rich and the time is loose. It is served from 7:00 am to 12:00 noon. There is no extra bed. The room is relatively compact, but it is enough for us. There are many smart devices, and the power supply does not stop when you leave the room. It is more suitable for bringing children. The location is convenient, about five minutes' walk from Sanyuanqiao Subway Station, highly recommended
